examples.example: 这家公司经过多年发展，市值不断攀升，取得了令人瞩目的成绩。

translate.english: After years of development, the market value of this company has been continuously rising and has achieved remarkable results.

examples.example: 这家企业通过不断创新和努力，市值逐年递增，展现出了强大的发展潜力。

translate.english: This enterprise, through continuous innovation and efforts, has its market value increasing year by year, showing strong development potential.

examples.example: 随着企业的良好运营，其市值稳步增长，前景一片光明。

translate.english: With the good operation of the enterprise, its market value has steadily increased and the prospects are very bright.
